name: Pong (Modern Remake)
description:
A remake of the famous 1973 Atari arcade game, PONG.

Controls: W and S keys for right player and up and down arrow for left player.

This project was just about done as I posted it, so there might be some bugs.

1 player and 2 player mode, colour scheme choice of black of blue.

Thank you to those who downloaded this and hope you enjoy.
